pullrequest.title: Added a tutorial for the oculus 2

content.raw:
Cool. I had to take an extra step of rotating the display in order to get the right orientation on my desktop. Not sure if you also had to do this on the razor laptops. 

If it helps, here's what I did:

In Ubuntu: 

Applications > System Tools > Preferences > Displays.

Select the Oculus display and set `Rotation` to `Counterclockwise`
content.html:
Cool. I had to take an extra step of rotating the display in order to get the right orientation on my desktop. Not sure if you also had to do this on the razor laptops.

If it helps, here's what I did:

In Ubuntu:

Applications > System Tools > Preferences > Displays.

Select the Oculus display and set Rotation to Counterclockwise
